data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ferreira, Sónia, Velo-Antón, Guillermo, Brochard, Christophe, Vieira, Cristiana, Alves, Paulo Célio, Thompson, David J., Watts, Phillip C., Brito, José Carlos (2014): A Critically Endangered new dragonfly species from Morocco: Onychogomphus boudoti sp. nov. (Odonata: Gomphidae). Zootaxa 3856 (3): 349-365, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3856.3.3
